org.gradle.api.plugins.jetty.util
Interface JettyPluginServer

org.gradle.api.plugins.jetty.util.Proxy
  org.gradle.api.plugins.jetty.util.JettyPluginServer
All Superinterfaces:
Proxy
interface JettyPluginServer
extends Proxy

JettyPluginServer Type to hide differences in API for different versions of Jetty for Server class.
